problems.title: Array Sum Calculator
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in an array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of all array elements

problems.title: Find Maximum Element
problems.description: Find and print the maximum element in an array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the maximum element

sampleTestCases.explanation: 9 is the largest element in the array

problems.title: Count Even Numbers
problems.description: Count how many even numbers are present in the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of even numbers

problems.title: Reverse Array
problems.description: Reverse the elements of the array and print them.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the reversed array elements space-separated

problems.title: Search Element
problems.description: Search for a given element in the array. Print 'YES' if found, 'NO' otherwise.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers\nThird line: x (element to search)
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' or 'NO'

problems.title: Find Minimum Element
problems.description: Find and print the minimum element in an array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the minimum element

problems.title: Count Positive Numbers
problems.description: Count how many positive numbers (greater than 0) are in the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of positive numbers

problems.title: Array Average
problems.description: Calculate and print the average of all elements in an array (rounded down to nearest integer).
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the average (integer division)

problems.title: First and Last Element
problems.description: Print the first and last element of the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print first and last element space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: First element is 10, last element is 50

problems.title: Count Occurrences
problems.description: Count how many times a given element appears in the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers\nThird line: x (element to count)
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of occurrences

problems.title: Array Rotation Challenge
problems.description: Given an array of n integers and a number k, rotate the array to the right by k positions in-place without using extra space.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size) and k (rotation count)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the rotated array elements space-separated

problems.title: Second Largest Element
problems.description: Find the second largest element in an array. If it doesn't exist, print -1.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the second largest element or -1

problems.title: Remove Duplicates
problems.description: Remove all duplicate elements from the array and print unique elements in their original order.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print unique elements space-separated in original order

sampleTestCases.explanation: Removed duplicate 2 and 3, keeping first occurrence

problems.title: Find Missing Number
problems.description: An array contains numbers from 1 to n+1 with one number missing. Find the missing number.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers (1 to n+1 range with one missing)
problems.outputFormat: Print the missing number

problems.title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Merge two sorted arrays into a single sorted array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n m (sizes of two arrays)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers (sorted)\nThird line: m space-separated integers (sorted)
problems.outputFormat: Print merged sorted array space-separated

problems.title: Frequency Counter
problems.description: Count the frequency of each element and print element-frequency pairs for elements that appear more than once.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print each element and its frequency (>1) on separate lines as 'element frequency'

problems.title: Partition Odd-Even
problems.description: Rearrange the array such that all odd numbers come before all even numbers. Order within odd/even doesn't matter.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print rearranged array with odds first, then evens

sampleTestCases.explanation: Odd numbers [1,3,5] come before even numbers [2,4,6]

problems.title: Pair Sum Finder
problems.description: Find if there exists a pair of elements in the array that sums to a given target. Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers\nThird line: target sum
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' if pair exists, 'NO' otherwise

problems.title: Leaders in Array
problems.description: Find all leader elements in an array. An element is a leader if it is greater than all elements to its right.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print all leader elements space-separated in order of appearance

sampleTestCases.explanation: 17 is greater than all to its right, 5>2, and 2 is the last element

problems.title: Move Zeros to End
problems.description: Move all zeros to the end of the array while maintaining the relative order of non-zero elements.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the modified array space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: Non-zero elements [1,3,12] maintain order, zeros moved to end

problems.title: Prefix Sum Query
problems.description: Calculate prefix sums and answer q queries. Each query gives index i, output sum of elements from 0 to i.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n q (array size and number of queries)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers\nNext q lines: one integer i per line (query index)
problems.outputFormat: Print q lines, each with the prefix sum up to given index

sampleTestCases.explanation: Prefix sum at index 2 is 1+2+3=6, at 4 is 15, at 0 is 1

problems.title: Longest Increasing Subsequence Length
problems.description: Find the length of the longest strictly increasing contiguous subarray.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the length of longest increasing subarray

sampleTestCases.explanation: Longest increasing subarray is [1,2,3,4] with length 4

problems.title: Equilibrium Index
problems.description: Find an equilibrium index where sum of elements on left equals sum on right. Print first such index or -1.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print equilibrium index (0-indexed) or -1

sampleTestCases.explanation: At index 3: left sum = -7+1+5 = -1, right sum = -4+3+0 = -1

problems.title: Sort Array 0-1-2
problems.description: Sort an array containing only 0s, 1s, and 2s in linear time without using sorting algorithms.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers (only 0, 1, or 2)
problems.outputFormat: Print sorted array space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: Array sorted with all 0s first, then 1s, then 2s

problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Find the maximum sum of any contiguous subarray using Kadane's algorithm.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the maximum subarray sum

problems.title: Stock Buy Sell Problem
problems.description: Find maximum profit from one buy and one sell transaction. Array represents stock prices on consecutive days.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (number of days)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers (prices)
problems.outputFormat: Print maximum profit, or 0 if no profit possible

sampleTestCases.explanation: Buy on day 2 (price=1), sell on day 5 (price=6), profit=5

problems.title: Sliding Window Maximum
problems.description: Find the maximum element in every window of size k as it slides through the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n k (array size and window size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print maximum of each window space-separated

problems.title: Rearrange Positive Negative
problems.description: Rearrange array so that positive and negative numbers alternate. Start with positive. If one type runs out, place remaining at end.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print rearranged array space-separated
problems.constraints: 1 ≤ n ≤ 1000\n-10^6 ≤ array[i] ≤ 10^6\narray contains both positive and negative numbers

problems.title: Triplet Sum Zero
problems.description: Find if there exist three elements in the array that sum to zero. Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' if such triplet exists, 'NO' otherwise

problems.title: Smallest Subarray With Sum Greater Than X
problems.description: Find length of smallest contiguous subarray with sum greater than given value x. If no such subarray exists, print -1.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n x (array size and target sum)\nSecond line: n space-separated positive integers
problems.outputFormat: Print length of smallest subarray or -1

problems.title: Trapping Rain Water
problems.description: Given n non-negative integers representing elevation map where width of each bar is 1, compute how much water can be trapped after raining.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated non-negative integers (heights)
problems.outputFormat: Print total trapped water units

problems.title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
problems.description: Find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence in an unsorted array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print length of longest consecutive sequence

sampleTestCases.explanation: Longest consecutive sequence is [1,2,3,4] with length 4

problems.title: Maximum Product Subarray
problems.description: Find the contiguous subarray within an array which has the largest product.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print maximum product

problems.title: Next Greater Permutation
problems.description: Rearrange numbers into the lexicographically next greater permutation. If not possible, arrange in ascending order.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated positive integers
problems.outputFormat: Print next permutation space-separated

problems.title: Count Inversions
problems.description: Count number of inversions in an array. An inversion is a pair (i,j) where i<j and arr[i]>arr[j].
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print total number of inversions

problems.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Find the median of two sorted arrays. If total elements is even, return average of middle two (integer division).
problems.inputFormat: First line: n m (sizes of arrays)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers (sorted)\nThird line: m space-separated integers (sorted)
problems.outputFormat: Print the median (integer)

problems.title: Subarray with Given Sum
problems.description: Find if there exists a contiguous subarray with sum equal to given value. Print start and end indices (0-indexed), or -1 -1 if not found.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n s (array size and target sum)\nSecond line: n space-separated positive integers
problems.outputFormat: Print start and end index space-separated, or '-1 -1'

sampleTestCases.explanation: Subarray [2,3,7] from index 1 to 3 has sum 12

problems.title: Longest Subarray With Zero Sum
problems.description: Find the length of the longest subarray with sum equal to zero.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (array size)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print length of longest zero-sum subarray

problems.title: Minimum Platforms Required
problems.description: Given arrival and departure times of trains, find minimum number of platforms required so no train waits.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (number of trains)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers (arrival times in 24hr format)\nThird line: n space-separated integers (departure times)
problems.outputFormat: Print minimum platforms needed

sampleTestCases.explanation: At 1100, trains at 940, 950, and 1100 all need platforms

problems.title: Four Sum Problem
problems.description: Find if there exist four elements in array that sum to a given target. Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n target (array size and target sum)\nSecond line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' if four elements sum to target, 'NO' otherwise
